title: Top U.S. states by number of hogs and pigs 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number in thousands for 10 number of States.
State Iowa has the highest Number in thousands and Kansas has the lowest Number in thousands.
The Number in thousands of State Iowa is 11.52% larger than the minimum value at Kansas.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number in thousands for 10 number of States.
State Iowa has the highest Number in thousands and Kansas has the lowest Number in thousands.
Second maximum Number in thousands is found at State North Carolina.
The highest State Iowa has 21460.0 more Number in thousands than the lowest State Kansas.

The State Kansas tends to be 3.65 percent lower than average.
